output.sentences: Little red riding hood who only wore a red cape looked more like a killer with her ax.
The pumpkinhead hats were worn by her parents who were growing to enjoy their own halloween fun.
She thought her brother was scary even though he said he didn't really feel scary in his dress.
Many of the costumes didn't make sense, but the idea of the holiday for all to indulge in candy and show their humors was met.
"Wow, I could never beat all of you at tricking and treating," said Uncle Don.
